Prepare
1) copy boost.zip from \\10.204.16.2\Home\ETP-AD1004 Multi-platform development to this folder and unzip it. boost.zip contains boost header files mainly.
2) copy relative boost library from \\10.204.16.2\Home\ETP-AD1004 Multi-platform development\boost libraries to cross_platform\3rd_party\boost\lib and unzip it according to your platform.
